chapters.title: Chapter 10: The Last of the Tabac
chapters.info: Lord Wakeda, p. 173—Lord of Arad Doman. He is not tall, is missing his right eye, and has a large scar on his face, though he might otherwise be handsome. He is Dragonsworn, and as powerful among them as Shimron. He now serves in Rodel Ituralde's army fighting the Seanchan. See also Ankaer; Rajabi; Shimron.
